name: DaysWithoutDrinking
0:
”Alexa, open my sobriety date”
”Alexa, start my sobriety date”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my sobriety date
des: Be happy for yourself & your accomplishments and vocalize your s☆¡t! Get out of your head every so often by vocalizing your thoughts. In doing so, you'll receive an audible response from Alexa in regards to the days remaining until that day we all look forward to. You know, that one day of the year that stands out the most. Yeah, that one, it stands out more than Rosie O'Donnell at an anorexia convention.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
